text: Elric is a fictional character created by Michael Moorcock. Elric may also refer to: * "Elric the Enchanter", a 1985 song by Hawkwind from The Chronicle of the Black Sword * Elric (comics), the character as he appears in American comic books * Stormbringer (role-playing game) or Elric!, a role-playing game by Chaosium * Elric, a technomage character in the Babylon 5 episode "The Geometry of Shadows" * Edward Elric and Alphonse Elric, the main characters of the anime and manga series Fullmetal Alchemist and their mother Trisha Elric ==See also== * Elrick (name)
title: Elric (disambiguation)
